pullrequest.title: Use sdformat4 from prerelease during gazebo7 development cycle

content.raw:
@\_jrivero_ we also need to add the `NEED_PRERELEASE` logic to the docker script [jenkins-scripts/docker/lib/gazebo-base-default.bash](#!/osrf/release-tools/src/0c2c3731dc508b8c34e08c7f0aec17a049dfa9cc/jenkins-scripts/docker/lib/gazebo-base-default.bash?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default) to fix jenkins failures:

* http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-default-devel-trusty-amd64/141/

~~~
E: Unable to locate package libsdformat4-dev
~~~
content.html:
@_jrivero_ we also need to add the NEED_PRERELEASE logic to the docker script jenkins-scripts/docker/lib/gazebo-base-default.bash to fix jenkins failures:

  • http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-default-devel-trusty-amd64/141/
E: Unable to locate package libsdformat4-dev
